short_summary: BELL 429 REPAIR PART NUMBERS PN: 429-010-433-101 ROD end PN: 429-010-433-103 ROD END
description: Bell 429 is to purchase the following repair parts for the Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD). Repair parts purchase is contingent upon contract consideration. Only Electra Salutron Inc and Clinebell Industries Inc were qualified to make offer. Please note that only invitees for this job will receive this notice.
full_summary:
================

**Tender Title**
---------------

Rod Ends for Bell 429 Aircraft

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS4365327498-Doc4365417021

**Notice Type and Status**
-------------------------

**Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement**
Due to **Request Expired** on January 3, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**:Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
*   **UNSPSC Code**: 25202500, Aircraft Equipment
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Region**: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Contract and Arrangement Information**
-----------------------------------------

*   **Solicitation and Contract Numbers**: WS4365327498-Doc4365417021
*   **Period of Contract**: January 4, 2024 - March 31, 2024
*   **Government Procurement Arrangement**: Supply Arrangement (SA) holders only
*   **Selected Suppliers**: Invited companies under the Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Project Overview**
-------------------

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the procurement of rod ends for the Bell 429 aircraft operated by Transport Canada. Only Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders with a valid T8493-140035 series SA are eligible to submit a proposal.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Edmond Egikian, PSPC/SPAC
Email: edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: At the time of rewriting this document, the above contact information remains current. Please verify with the Government for any changes.
